name: $ActivityDefinition
desc: The EventDefinition resource provides a reusable description of when a particular event can occur.

name: $EventDefinition
desc: The Measure resource provides the definition of a quality measure.

name: $Measure
desc: A formal computable definition of an operation (on the RESTful interface) or a named query (using the search interaction).

name: $OperationDefinition
desc: This resource allows for the definition of various types of plans as a sharable, consumable, and executable artifact. The resource is general enough to support the description of a broad range of clinical artifacts such as clinical decision support rules, order sets and protocols.

name: $PlanDefinition
desc: A structured set of questions intended to guide the collection of answers from end-users. Questionnaires provide detailed control over order, presentation, phraseology and grouping to allow coherent, consistent data collection.
